v1.19.0.description: fixes references to IE9 stylesheets in layout templates
fixes expection thrown by customEvent method on IE9 and above

v1.18.0.description: fixes an issue where focus states were incorrect on multi-hero and feed-hero items
adds text underline to focus states of button, call to action, and heavyweight action triggers
fixes an issue where the placeholder text was too light on input fields
adds a helper class of x-offset-content to provide a way to align content correctly to the content grid
Updates customEvent method in htmlExtensions to support passing event name as string
fixes an issue transpiling keycodes.ts in partner projects

v1.17.0.description: updates heading and subheading to have regular font weight when under 20 pixels
updates hover and focus states for call to actions, buttons, social, and heavyweight action triggers

v1.16.0.description: adds lightweight options to call to action and button components
updates textarea and text field components flex option to fill the full width of their container
increases font weight for pivots in components, multi-feature and heading modules
fixes a property undefined script error in ObservableComponent.unObserve() in IE10

v1.15.0.description: fixes issue with Windows blocking dev builds

v1.14.0.description: applies variable to base Sass for UHF selector reduction
adds accessibility linter to validate task

v1.13.0.description: fixes an issue where c-paragraph-4 recieved too much top padding
adds new scss-lint feature to check for space after comment
creates UHF variables for use in Sass selector namespacing and output size reduction
applies UHF variable to base Sass for selector namespacing

v1.12.0.description: assembles templated wrapper .hbs with report files for JavaScript unit tests
fixes an issue where Picture Fill was not being loaded correctly
adds immersive hero item and immersive hero as new modules

v1.11.0.description: adds file splitting for IE9 support when CSS selectors exceed IE9/8 max of 4095
fixes CDN CSS import having the wrong URL

v1.10.0.description: changes bold and strong elements to a font weight of 700
fixes several validation errors in auto-suggest
removes Bootstrap references from examples and CSS
fixes the htmllinting issues and adds new html5 linter

v1.9.0.description: changes text on 'see all' links to 'show all
fixes comment removal from readme HTML files
fixes an issue where content toggle was not rendering correctly in modules including age-gate
adds Sass utility for better management of variables and transitions
adds backstopjs support for regression testing
updates css browser prefix support to fix issues in iOS and Android browsers

v1.8.0.description: fixes issues with cssmin targeting all files on validate
fixes RTL vars where interpolation is not needed
updates video-play-action mixin to address fragility issues with glyph placement
fixes layout issues on banner, compare-chart, content-rich-block, and refinements caused by incorrectly applied data-grid container
fixes issue with margins on module test pages
moves schemas to individual component & module folders, add a schema validation tool
disallows text-transform property in scss linter
adds Sass best practice readme documentation
updates wraith test with new configs
updates vertical spacing for heading, paragraph, caption, select menu with border, and textarea and text-field components when inside a form
